titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Multiple Sclerosis Awareness Week.
Supporting the goals and ideals of Multiple Sclerosis Awareness Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
Expresses support for the goals and ideals of Multiple Sclerosis Awareness Week.
Reaffirms the U.S. commitment to ending multiple sclerosis by promoting awareness about individuals affected by multiple sclerosis and supporting research and education programs.
Recognizes people living with multiple sclerosis and salutes the health care professionals and medical researchers who assist those so affected and continue to work to find ways to stop the disease, restore what has been lost, and end multiple sclerosis forever.
